review: totally enjoyed the game  just needs some patience on the part of both players  pros loved the graphics some interesting levels worth the small price i paid 3 usd cons short  only 3 levels if you want purely intellectual puzzles maybe not this game  theres a timed jump for example i wish there was an option to turn off timeouts and on a longer level a checkpoint would have been appreciated i dont adore doing the same thing over and over to get to the point of failure
